name: Tony Crow's Pro Scyther
description:
Soul Harvest Festival is about to take a turn for the worse with Tony Crow at the market, ready to reap the spoils! He will rattle some bones, grind unending rails, and take many heads.

This is our love letter to the classic Tony Hawk Pro Skater games. What we have here is a little bit of jank, a whole lot of comedy, and our best stab at classic skateboarding gameplay. It is a touch more casual, and definitely more gory, but the nostalgia was strong during development. Here’s hoping you get some of that as well. :D

Controls are tricky for this kind of a game, so have a few options:

Best played on a gamepad:

  • Y: Grind
  • X: Trick
  • B: Manual
  • A: Jump
  • Left Joystick: Move

Keyboard Controls:

  • X: Grind
  • C: Trick
  • Z: Manual
  • Space: Jump
  • Arrow Keys: Move

Keyboard and mouse(don’t try in the Browser version!):

  • Left mouse: Grind
  • Middle mouse: Trick
  • Right mousse: Manual
  • Space: Jump
  • WASD: Move
